name: GBRPG Prototype
description:
GBRPG Prototype is a game created for the GBJAM 9 game jam. It was created in under a week including most of the engine. It is intended to be  a prototype for a potential future rpg using the rules of the jam. The prototype is a very rough version with some incomplete features and and not so great collisions. I will consider making a full game once I have made more progress on other projects.

Keyboard Controls:

Z - A

X - B

Space - Select

Enter - Start

D-pad - Arrow Keys
